availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky farmer. Daviess County, Kentucky native. Married Esther M. Gardiner Glenn in 1855. Father of William H. Glenn and John A. Glenn.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 213. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 2, p. 125. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Precinct 8, p. 405.
